short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save/Load the urls of your current tabs to a file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super basic extension for saving/loading a browsing session.

"Save Tabs" button saves the URLs of your window's open tabs to a text file.

"Load Tabs" button allows you to select a previously saved (or manually created) text file of URLs (one per line), and opens a new window with a tab for each of those URLs.
